newsitem.title: USA: Freddie Mac to redeem $25 mln debenture issue.
newsitem.headline: Freddie Mac to redeem $25 mln debenture issue.

text.p: Freddie Mac said Thursday that on June 19 it will redeem the entire $25 million principal amount of its 8.22 percent fixed-rate debentures due June 19, 2006.
The issue has cusip number 3134A0T85. They will be redeemed at a price equal to 100 percent of the principal amount.
Payment of principal plus interest accrued to the redemption date will be made to shareholders of record as of the close of business on June 18, 1997, Freddie Mac said.
Freddie Mac is a corporation chartered by Congress that buys mortgages from lenders and packages them into securities for investors.
